trans-unit.source: Specifies the security settings for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref>.
This class cannot be inherited.
This class specifies the kind of security to be applied to the `wsFederationHttpBinding` binding and the specific security settings.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity"></xref> class.
Indicates the message security settings for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref>.
The object returned specifies detailed message-level security properties for the `wsFederationHttpBinding`.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp"></xref> value.
Gets or sets the type of security to be applied.
The enumeration member returned specifies which general type of security is to be applied.
The allowed values are <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode.Message> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode.TransportWithMessageCredential>.
In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode.Message> security mode, the message is sent over HTTP and SOAP message security is used to protect the message.
Client authentication is performed based on the issued token obtained from the security token service.
Server authentication is based on the server's certificate.
In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode.TransportWithMessageCredential> security mode, the message is sent over HTTPS.
Client authentication is performed by including the issued token obtained from the security token service in the SOAP message.
Server authentication, based on the server's certificate, is performed as part of the HTTPS connection setup.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
The default is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode.Message"></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message"></xref> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
`true` if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message"></xref> property value should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Mode"></xref> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
`true` if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Mode"></xref> property value should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
